timeline.message:
Raptor Documentation - Added documentation on the Range Raptor "time-line" and forward vs. reverse search.
 - Rename calculator 'latestArrivalTime' to 'stopArrivalTime'.
Refactor RaptorTripPattern into 3 separate roles: RaptorRoute, RaptorTimeTable and RaptorTripPattern.
Map board and alight slack (default & pr mode) for RouterConfig and RoutingRequest to RaptorRequest.
Map board and alight slack (default & pr mode) for RouterConfig and RoutingRequest to RaptorRequest.
Refactor RaptorTripPattern into 3 separate roles: RaptorRoute, RaptorTimeTable and RaptorTripPattern.

Added navigation from RaptorTripSchedule to RaptorTripPattern.
 - Renamed TransitDataProvider to RaptorTransitDataProvider.
 - Fixed a few spelling errors in TestRaptorTripSchedule.
Map board and alight slack (default & pr mode) for RouterConfig and RoutingRequest to RaptorRequest.

Fix time-shift issues and add board and alight slack to Transmodel Graph QL API.
  - Add toString to Raptor path classes to be able to debug the path more easily.
  - Improve naming by more consistent naming.
  - Improve unit tests.

Fix time-shift issues and add board and alight slack to Transmodel Graph QL API.
  - Add toString to Raptor path classes to be able to debug the path more easily.
  - Improve naming by more consistent naming.
  - Improve unit tests.

timeline.author: abyrd

timeline.message: Raptor documentation updated with board/alight slack implementation notes in the README.
Raptor documentation updated with board/alight slack implementation notes in the README.
